alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wayne and central Washtenaw Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Southfield to Dixboro to near Grass Lake. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Intense Rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and rapid ponding of water. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Livonia, Ypsilanti and Dixboro around 530 PM EDT. Canton, Detroit, Dearborn and Belleville around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Inkster, Highland Park, Pittsfield Township, Melvindale, Redford, Plymouth, Bridgewater, Garden City, Pleasant Lake and Barton Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
